name: Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
description: EU-Canada preferential agreement covering industrial goods, agriculture and services.

name: EU-UK Trade and Cooperation Agreement
description: Post-Brexit trade framework enabling preferential access for goods and services.

name: EU-Japan Economic Partnership Agreement
description: Comprehensive agreement providing tariff reductions and regulatory cooperation.

name: US-Mexico-Canada Agreement
description: North American trade agreement replacing NAFTA with updated origin requirements.

name: Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership
description: Asia-Pacific agreement harmonising rules of origin across 15 countries.
